docs.lead_paragraph: Giving the F.D.A. power to regulate tobacco products will bring to an end the days when this rogue industry could inflict its harmful products on Americans with impunity.
docs.snippet: Giving the F.D.A. power to regulate tobacco products will bring to an end the days when this rogue industry could inflict its harmful products on Americans with impunity.

headline.sub: Bill Would Regulate Harmful Chemicals in Cigarettes
headline.print_headline: SENATE APPROVES TIGHT REGULATION OVER CIGARETTES
headline.seo: Senate Approves Tight Regulation Over Cigarettes
headline.main: Senate Approves Tight Regulation Over Cigarettes

docs.lead_paragraph: The bill would give the F.D.A. the power to impose potentially strict new controls on tobacco products.
docs.snippet: The bill would give the F.D.A. the power to impose potentially strict new controls on tobacco products.

headline.main: Senate Passes Landmark Bill to Regulate Tobacco

docs.abstract: The president is expected to sign into law a bill that would allow the government to regulate tobacco products in vastly expanded ways.
docs.lead_paragraph: In a striking contrast to previous years when a powerful tobacco lobby held considerable influence, the Senate on Thursday approved giving the government vast powers to regulate tobacco products.
docs.snippet: The president is expected to sign into law a bill that would allow the government to regulate tobacco products in vastly expanded ways.
